_instructions: This file contains user-specific translation overrides. You can customize any text by adding the translation key and your preferred text. Leave keys you don't want to change out of this file.
_note: This file will be merged with base language translations. Only include keys you want to override. Missing keys will use the default translations.
_how_to_use: 1. Edit the values below to customize translations. 2. Only include keys you want to change. 3. Remove the _instruction lines before sending. 4. Send this JSON file back to be uploaded to your account.
